seo.description: Professional towing services in Grafton, WI. 24/7 emergency towing, roadside assistance, and more. Fast, reliable service.

testimonial1.text: I was stranded in Grafton after my car broke down. They arrived within 20 minutes and got me back on the road in no time. Their emergency service is truly reliable!
testimonial1.author: Jessica J.

testimonial2.text: Late night breakdown in Grafton - Grafton Towing was there in 25 minutes. Professional, courteous, and got my vehicle to the shop safely. Highly recommend their emergency service!
testimonial2.author: Sarah J.

testimonial3.text: Needed a flatbed tow truck for my SUV in Grafton. Grafton Towing provided a flatbed service and handled my vehicle with care. Very impressed with their professionalism!
testimonial3.author: Michael I.
